content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Tours are available daily from 23 September - 15 November: Drop-in: Pop by the Meeting Points in our libraries between 10am and 4pm. Tours run on the hour and half-hour. Tours at Music Library are drop-in only. Book online: Like to have a date in the diary? Book a tour online using the links below. If you are a member of staff who wants to book a student tour, please email Library-Helpline@nottingham.ac.uk. If you are a member of the public or from a School/Sixth Form, please visit our Visitors webpage. Meet staff at the Welcome Point sign in our libraries Book a tour of our science and engineering library Book a tour of our arts and social sciences library Book a tour of our medicine and health sciences library Book a tour of our business library Book a tour of our education and computer science library Veterinary medicine and biosciences library King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
